name: YellowPages
0:
”Alexa, open Yellow Pages.”
”Alexa, ask Yellow Pages to search for the nearest gas station.”
”Alexa, ask Yellow Pages to call home depot.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yellow pages
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Yellow Pages skill works with the Real Yellow Pages mobile app for local searches in the United States. Make a request on any Alexa-enabled mobile device such as Echo Buds, Alexa hands-free phones, or ask directly from the Alexa App. Ask Yellow Pages to search for restaurants, services, and gas!


- "Alexa, ask Yellow Pages to find the nearest Starbucks."
- "Alexa, ask Yellow Pages to find a gas station."
- "Alexa, ask Yellow Pages to find a plumber in Los Angeles, California."
- "Alexa, ask Yellow Pages what time does Applebees open tomorrow."
- "Alexa, ask Yellow Pages to call Home Depot."
- "Alexa, ask Yellow Pages to find the best breakfast."
